message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $175 is a bit out of my price range. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $80 at this time. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand your position, but $80 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $125, which still leaves me a fair profit. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're interested.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $125 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95, which is a fair price for both of us. Let's try to make this work.

Bob, I understand your budget, but $95 still doesn't work for me. I'm willing to come down to $110. I've already come down significantly from my initial price, and this is my final offer before I have to consider selling to another buyer.  Let me know if we can make this happen.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $100. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground, but $100 still falls short of what I need. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105. This is truly my final offer. If we can't agree on this, I'll have to consider selling to another buyer.
